title: Jamala
author: Jamala
content: Now that INEC and politicians have kept Nigerians in a confused state, full of fear and uncertainties, and with utterance and threats by grieving and celebrating parties? Should we take their threats serious? Do you think May 29 handover will hold?

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: As Naija take be and APC dey power wey their party member win d election, nothing fit sup 4 May 29, dem go swear Tibubu in. And if d guy don hold power like dis, make dem forget the election tribunal, all of dem know where dem dey meet and how dem dey threaten dem judiciary make dem free their persin. Naija na scam, how election go be like dat and u no fit conclude presidential tribunal before swearing in a new presido? Dem fit do am within 90 days naw.E dey pain me as dis country be, but nothing fit change unless we do true federalism or split.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Jamala on April 12, 2023, 06:11:58 PMNow that INEC and politicians have kept Nigerians in a confused state, full of fear and uncertainties, and with utterance and threats by grieving and celebrating parties? Should we take their threats serious? Do you think May 29 handover will hold?If while Dino Melaye & other party representatives been dey yan for Abuja collation center and yet Prof. Mahmood went ahead to announce Tinubu as president-elect, and yet Buhari went ahead to congratulate him few hours later. Anybody wey tell you say on May 29th say Tinubu will not be sworn in tok big lie, bcos on that day he will be sworn in and yet nothing go happen, and if by mistake una try protest, omo una fit witness another massacre wer go pass "ENDSars" oh, bcos these pple no get conscience, and as such they fit do anything just to grab that political power. So my brothers & sisters for this forum, I go advise you say please make you no join any protest oh, bcos I really love una, make we just try dey chop our campaign money small small dey go, and leave politics for politicians

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: The deed has been done, INEC do rig election give Tinubu,so I no see anything wey go make them no swear am in on May 29. If you no gree,he ho first sit down for the seat before court go conclude whether na Tinubu win or not. If them pass judgement say no be Tinubu win,definitely he go step down for the winner. I no think say Nigeria go carry power give military to hold first till tribunal judge the case because person must sit in that sit on May 29. Na only God fit commot this corrupt politicians from power.Quote from: EarnOnVictor on April 18, 2023, 06:20:46 AME dey pain me as dis country be, but nothing fit change unless we do true federalism or split.As for my own, na to split sure pass because this country problems and backwardness to big for one man head,come be say na for old man head.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Yes of course, it will still hold na. Definitely, the law stated that APC presidential candidate won the 2023 general election so on may 29th, a new regim will take over. Our prayers now should be that the new one will be better that the other and take Nigeria to a better place if possible.  We should all pray for the country for a better tomorrow.Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on April 18, 2023, 07:05:19 AMSo my brothers & sisters for this forum, I go advise you say please make you no join any protest oh, bcos I really love una, make we just try dey chop our campaign money small small dey go, and leave politics for politiciansYes of course we should all hide our head please who only the living will benefit from tomorrow. Don't kill your self matters that doesn't concern you.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Hatchy on April 18, 2023, 05:30:01 PMYes of course, it will still hold na. Definitely, the law stated that APC presidential candidate won the 2023 general election so on may 29th, a new regim will take over.Na so you see am say Tinubu win the election abi them force power out from the people. We all sabi say na peter obi win this election so if you want talk about inauguration then you fit talk but forget about say na Tinubu win because no be him win. Quote from: Hatchy on April 18, 2023, 05:30:01 PM Our prayers now should be that the new one will be better that the other and take Nigeria to a better place if possible.  We should all pray for the country for a better tomorrow.You don make me laugh here. So how you thing say things fit better with Tinubu as president. Forget am because na more hard time dey come but make God still dey provide for us. Na prayer be our problem for the country. We pray and forget to do other things wey go help the prayer work.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: One thing way no too sweet me na this statement of "them know where them dey meet". Na true say, e dey happen like that and no need for common man to kill encef gor politicians and their family greed but, e dey very painful say, we dey this helpless to dey allow this things happen and all we go fit do na to dey watch.Where the hope wan dey again for a common Nigerian if, INEC and the judicial system no fit intervene.The matter be say, a lot go wrong for this just concluded election and if INEC no go follow en rules and the judicial system go allow this thing happen, e no go spoil plenty things for we country way don spoil already.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP it is clearly stated in the Constitution that May 29 is handover and swearing in of a new government as amended. No amount of threat can stop the law from taking it course. INEC and other third parties can not stop the hand over come may 29. The law also respect it's order and can not do anything about it. One thing I know is that every one can exercise their grievance at the law court but can not stop it's course from taking effect. There have been many instances and occurrences where things similar in nature to this rants occurred but nothing happened. It did not stop the law from taking its course. So what ever they are planning to do wouldn't hold any water. I am not talking because of political parties involved, I am not talking in favour of any party but I am talking based on past occurrences and events. The hand over and swearing in would hold.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Our politicians nor dey take us to be anything at all. If not them for don put the democracy wey dem dey see for foreign countries for Naija. Nigeria na very corrupt country, I dey tell you. If not how people wey dey sound and fit go campaign for a sick old crook with drug case to come lead them or even campaign for Atiku wey get bad record too. It just shows that anything goes in naija. Old men nor wan do the right things again. Na cruise we dey now.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Quote from: Jamala on April 12, 2023, 06:11:58 PMNow that INEC and politicians have kept Nigerians in a confused state, full of fear and uncertainties, and with utterance and threats by grieving and celebrating parties? Should we take their threats serious? Do you think May 29 handover will hold?One thing i like this country be say people just try but a fact that still remains that they will never succum to the request of the masses is just hanging around because na watin dey there mind nai dem go still do because dem no send any of us wey be the masses. With past and current experience i have had in this country of our, i can boldly tell you that nothing is actually going to happen on that may 29th or sorry my mistake actually the only thing thats gonna take is the swearing and handing over of government from buhari to bola tinubu.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: May 29 transition of political seat go hold without an iota of doubt. All these you’re hearing between INEC and government officials are just to distract the attention of the public. Such as never happened before and it won’t now. APC is the ruling party and they’ve won for another 8 years, they will do everything possible to clear any obstacle to stand their way of getting into those seats again. The issue of transition on may 29 is not something to doubt about.

comments.author: MainIbem
comments.created_time: April 18, 2023, 10:51:43 PMLast edit: April 23, 2023, 09:52:35 PM by MainIbem
comments.body: You people are here deliberating on what would happen or not, get this clearer and better that "Carry rope tie goat and carry goat tie rope" is the same then you will stopped to start thinking about politicians. It's true they are of different party's but internally they are recycling the power within them selves just if they do it without people voting them it would be too bad and out of law. Already they knew who is to seat on that 001 position but they only came to make it known and official to us, so I strongly believe the country will be at safe side comes 29 May 2023.So, Sir ma please have a deep sleep and forget about government and their political jingoism.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: As the matter be so, them don swear in Tinubu come May 29 and no peso go fit stop am. You hear as INEC take talk am on the day of pronouncing Tinubu as president of Nigeria. They said and I quote ''if you are challenging the emerging of Tinubu as the new president of Nigeria, go to the court''. So as for, peso or any group of persons or political parties no fit cough on that day(May 29) because any funny play that day na straight to nga(prison).It is so painful(I no go lie give you) that Tinubu is going to be our president but what will someone do in a country where rule of law doesn't stand, old and wicked politician doesn't care about the youths of the country. The only thing they care about is the power and fame for themselves and their family. As the matter be so, we the youths go survive whether Tinubu go continue to be our president thereafter after May 29th.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Yes it might hold, you know in Nigeria who inec declares winner will always be the winner, the winner emerges power, while the other contending opponents can be striving the court cases,A very funny country though...

comments.author: Kgdktac
comments.body: well, i don see video of soldiers rehearsing on the march pass for dat day. what an unfortunate day it'll turn out to be for most of the youths. that said i believe the resistance no go down in the event that he was sworn in. we cant be this unfortunate whereby everybody is now aware that things are faulty yet most peeps cheer on.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on April 18, 2023, 08:52:10 PMOur politicians nor dey take us to be anything at all. If not them for don put the democracy wey dem dey see for foreign countries for Naija. Nigeria na very corrupt country, I dey tell you. If not how people wey dey sound and fit go campaign for a sick old crook with drug case to come lead them or even campaign for Atiku wey get bad record too. It just shows that anything goes in naija. Old men nor wan do the right things again. Na cruise we dey now.Mate, the matter sef tie wrapper o. My friend been dey tell me say Naija don jump from frying pan enter fire I begin laugh.  Seriously let us tell ourselves the truth which way are we heading to? Old men still in the corridors of power  and I was wondering those days when we use to sing we are the leaders of tommorow but my brother the leaders Dem wey dey power that time still dey grapse the power till today and dem never tire for the power. Na the same youths dey vote them put for the same power wey the elders Dem dey. I just think the youths are really not ready for the revolution and change they  glamour for. The same youths are used to rig election and same youths help them steal ballot boxes so how does the corruption stops, when the youths take part in all these activities do you expect the old men still in power to handover power to the youth?

comments.author: Techguysally
comments.body: Bros as I just see this your post na laugh I first laugh, bro don’t you know what your country is capable of doing again? Everything is planned out already that transition bah wei u de see e go sub, u no de see they just announce they planning community for it…… bro God go help us for this country.

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: Quote from: Jamala on April 12, 2023, 06:11:58 PMNow that INEC and politicians have kept Nigerians in a confused state, full of fear and uncertainties, and with utterance and threats by grieving and celebrating parties? Should we take their threats serious? Do you think May 29 handover will hold?my dear, your question make sense oooh May 29 is around the corner, wether e go hold or not?my dear you know say na them them election we them no win them collect am na hand over na e them no go give,them go hand over that day,but when God go vess for them, dey no go like wetin go happened to them because now dey think say na them create this world and them dey do anyhow..The thing don dey clear now say court don join hand The spoil the country the more before we be dey say court na the last hope for the common man but na now no hope for the common man oooh again, wetin make the court never judge the election matter since February till now, because them dey try arrange the matter wey them won present to us make e sweet us,but God go shame them,..
